resp = client.reindex(
    source={
        "index": "metricbeat-*"
    },
    dest={
        "index": "metricbeat"
    },
    script={
        "lang": "painless",
        "source": "ctx._index = 'metricbeat-' + (ctx._index.substring('metricbeat-'.length(), ctx._index.length())) + '-1'"
    },
)
print(resp)
